t1.name: Sprite (355mL Can)
t1.description:
Sprite, a lemon-lime flavored soft drink.
From the Coca-Cola Company, Sprite is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Sprite also comes in 710mL bottles or 2L bottles.

t2.name: Sprite (710mL Bottle)
t2.description:
Sprite, a lemon-lime flavored soft drink.
From the Coca-Cola Company, Sprite is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Sprite also comes in 355mL cans or 2L bottles.

t3.name: Sprite (2L Bottle)
t3.description:
Sprite, a lemon-lime flavored soft drink.
From the Coca-Cola Company, Sprite is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Sprite also comes in 355mL cans or 710mL bottles.

t1.name: Coca-Cola (355mL Can)
t1.description:
Coca-Cola, a lemon-lime flavored soft drink.
Coca-Cola is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Coca-Cola also comes in 710mL bottles or 2L bottles.

t2.name: Coca-Cola (710mL Bottle)
t2.description:
Coca-Cola, the ubiquitous flavored soft drink.
Coca-Cola is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Coca-Cola also comes in 355mL cans or 2L bottles.

t3.name: Coca-Cola (2L Bottle)

Coca-Cola is one of the best-selling soft drinks in the world. Coca-Cola also comes in 355mL cans or 710mL bottles.
